attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: currently little or no financial help for parents who lose children. State should pay for a basic funeral for children aged 0-18 to make a dificult time easier. Thank you

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make funerals for children free."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22935


Prime Minister's Office
